thread.title: Profisee Appoints New Chief Marketing Officer
thread.title_full: Profisee Appoints New Chief Marketing Officer

author: prbuzz.com
title: Profisee Appoints New Chief Marketing Officer
text:
ATLANTA, GA — September 22, 2015— Profisee, a master data management software company, is pleased to announce it has strengthened its executive leadership team with a key appointment. Jeff Wilson joins Profisee as Chief Marketing Officer to head global marketing, reporting to Profisee CEO Ian Ahern.
Wilson is a senior executive with over 20 years of experience in the software industry, building and transforming businesses in multiple industries and markets. Working in all aspects of business, Wilson has an extensive background in leading sales and marketing teams, and driving go-to-market execution and operational efficiency. He has held prior senior management positions at ORTEC, INMAR, ARIBA, PROCURI and AGILE, and is widely recognized for his strategic vision and team-building finesse.
“Jeff brings a wealth of experience in sales, marketing, and company operations to Profisee,” says Ahern. “He complements the wealth of BI and MDM knowledge on the management team with business-process-centric experience in software, cloud, and subscription business models – expertise perfectly suited for growing our global MDM presence.”
Wilson says, “I am excited to be part of a company that understands and delivers on the potential of MDM as the foundation for successful business strategies. The Profisee team represents a wealth of MDM knowledge, and their combined expertise has positioned the company as a leader in the MDM technology marketplace. I look forward to working with them to establish Profisee as the world’s leading provider of business-empowering MDM solutions.”
About Profisee
Profisee is a master data management software company focused on delivering enterprise-grade MDM capabilities through its Master Data Maestro™ software suite. As a Microsoft Gold Application Development Partner, Profisee has a worldwide reputation for Master Data Management expertise and competence with Microsoft Master Data Services. For more information about Profisee’s solutions, please visit www.profisee.com .
Media Contact:
Debra Robic
Director, Marketing Communications, Profisee
